selectedVerses.text: Now the upper chambers were narrower, for the galleries took more away from them than from the lower and middle chambers of the building.

But we see him who for a little while was made lower than the angels, namely Jesus, crowned with glory and honor because of the suffering of death, so that by the grace of God he might taste death for everyone.
His daughter was Sheerah, who built both Lower and Upper Beth-horon, and Uzzen-sheerah.
Then it goes down westward to the territory of the Japhletites, as far as the territory of Lower Beth-horon, then to Gezer, and it ends at the sea.
And the pavement ran along the side of the gates, corresponding to the length of the gates. This was the lower pavement.
